#Text=My associates and I heartily oppose Amon 's so - called  Equalist " policies .

column1: #Text=We got benders and nonbenders living together down here , but do you see us fightin ' ?
#Text=No siree ; we 've figured out how to harmoniously co-exist .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You are a wise and noble hobo .
#Text=This is the best - tasting street gruel I 've ever had .
#Text=" Gommu says : " I culled it from the finest dumpsters the city has to offer !
